newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Greencore sees growth potential in U.S..
newsitem.headline: Greencore sees growth potential in U.S..

text.p: Ireland's Greencore Group Plc said on Thursday that recent acqusitions had consolidated its strong position in the Irish malt and agribusiness sectors and provided a platform for growth in the U.S.
The food and agribusiness company announced a 16 percent increase in pre-tax profits to 54.62 million punts, and said it expected to outstrip its 200,200 tonne 1996/97 sugar quota.

"Overall, the group continues to trade in line with our expectations and our strong trading and financial position give us an excellent base for further progress," Greencore said in its results statement.
